section_title: Power to exchange houses in Royal Parks, &c. for other houses.
section_text: 13 1 With the consent of His Majesty, signified in writing under the Royal Sign Manual, the Treasury may by order— a . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  b transfer from the  Secretary of State  to the  Crown Estate Commissioners  the management of any house within any of the Royal forests, parks or chases which is, at the time being, under the management of the  Secretary of State . 2 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  4 In this section the expression “ house ” includes any garden or portion of ground attached to and usually occupied with the house or otherwise required for the amenity or convenience thereof.
